tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_media_activity (
    user_id INT,
    platform VARCHAR(50),
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    activity_date DATE,
    activity_time TIME,
    activity_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    platform VARCHAR(50),
    post_text TEXT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username TEXT,
    platform TEXT,
    followers_count INT,
    posts_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE post_analysis (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    platform TEXT,
    post_content TEXT,
    likes_count INT,
    comments_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE engagement_history (
    engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    platform TEXT,
    engagement_type TEXT,
    engagement_datetime DATETIME
);

CREATE TABLE platform_stats (
    platform TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
    users_count INT,
    posts_count INT,
    total_likes INT,
    total_comments INT
);

CREATE TABLE activity_trends (
    trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_type TEXT,
    trend_description TEXT,
    trend_period TEXT,
    trend_value FLOAT
);
